LanguageData.JRWHylonomusReconstruct.label: Hylonomus
LanguageData.JRWHylonomusReconstruct.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #023982-1860 [HYLONOMUS LYELLI] CODENAME: DWELLER >221
The earliest known reptile, unquestionable due to their fossil record, as other 'earlier' reptiles are potentially amphibians or too fragmentary to truly understand. Hylnomus are brightly oloured and friendly by nature, and make good pets. In the wild, they often compete with iguanas, filling a similar niche.
LanguageData.JRWHylonomusReconstruct.tools.head.label: head
